Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Ohio/Michigan
ShortDescription: Eastbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago & Mies Van Der Rohe Way: due to, street blockage near Ohio/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago and Mies Van Der Rohe Way: due to, street blockage near Ohio/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed at Western
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are standing at Western  due to an animal on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are standing at Western  due to an animal on the tracks

Shuttle buses have been requested from Midway to 35th/Archer provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. Consider using the #62 Archer bus an alternative service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute near 47th/State
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses temp. rerouted EB: 47th, LaSalle, 43rd and State; WB 47th, LaSalle, 51st, State and 47th: due to, street blockage near 47th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 47th/State, due to street blockage near 47th/State.

Eastbound buses will operate via 47th, LaSalle, 43rd and State including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Westbound buses will operate via 47th, LaSalle, 51st and State.

Allow extra travel time.
